SAI_GON.name: Sai Gon
SAI_GON.description: The heart of Ho Chi Minh City, Sai Gon ward represents the perfect blend of historical heritage and modern development. This central ward is home to many of the city's most iconic landmarks, from colonial-era architecture to contemporary skyscrapers. The area serves as the main administrative and business hub, while maintaining its cultural significance through preserved historical sites and traditional street layouts. The riverside location has been crucial to the ward's development since its early days as a trading port.
interesting_facts: The name 'Sai Gon' originates from 'Sai Con' or 'Cotton Tree', referring to the Kapok trees that once dominated the area. Historical documents from the 17th century mention this name, which was given by the Khmer people who lived here before the arrival of Vietnamese settlers.
The ward contains the city's first commercial port, dating back to the 18th century
Home to the highest concentration of French colonial buildings in the city
The iconic Bitexco Tower was designed to resemble a lotus bud, Vietnam's national flower

BEN_THANH.name: Ben Thanh
BEN_THANH.description: Ben Thanh ward is the commercial and tourist heart of Ho Chi Minh City, centered around the iconic Ben Thanh Market. This vibrant area seamlessly combines traditional market culture with modern shopping experiences. The ward is particularly known for its street food scene, with numerous food stalls and local restaurants offering authentic Vietnamese cuisine. The area comes alive at night with bustling night markets and entertainment venues, making it a must-visit destination for both locals and tourists. The ward's strategic location makes it a major transportation hub, connecting various parts of the city.
interesting_facts: The name 'Ben Thanh' means 'Citadel Wharf', derived from the original market built near a fortress (thanh) by the river port (ben) in the late 18th century. The market was relocated to its current location in 1914, but the name remained as a testament to its historical origins.
Ben Thanh Market has operated continuously since 1914
The market's clock tower has become one of the city's most recognizable symbols
During the colonial period, the area was known as 'Les Halles Centrales'

XUAN_HOA.name: Xuan Hoa
XUAN_HOA.description: Xuan Hoa ward represents a harmonious blend of historical heritage and modern urban development. The area is characterized by its tree-lined streets, colonial-era villas, and vibrant community spaces. Known for its educational institutions and cultural venues, the ward maintains a perfect balance between residential tranquility and urban convenience. The area has preserved much of its architectural heritage while adapting to contemporary urban needs, making it a prime example of sustainable urban development in Ho Chi Minh City.
interesting_facts: Xuan Hoa is a historic place name dating back to 1880 when Tan Dinh village was renamed to Xuan Hoa village. The Xuan Hoa Temple, a city-level architectural and artistic relic, stands as testament to this area's existence and development through centuries.
The ward contains several French colonial villas that have been perfectly preserved
Home to one of the city's oldest educational institutions
Features a unique urban planning style that combines French colonial grid patterns with traditional Vietnamese architecture

XOM_CHIEU.name: Xom Chieu
XOM_CHIEU.description: Xom Chieu ward is a traditional area that combines local markets with residential communities. The ward maintains its historical character while adapting to modern urban needs.
interesting_facts: Home to one of the oldest traditional markets
Known for its local food culture

AN_DONG.name: An Dong
AN_DONG.description: An Dong ward is renowned for its rich cultural heritage and bustling commercial activities. The ward is centered around the historic An Dong Market, a major textile and handicraft trading center that has been operating for generations. The area represents a fascinating mix of traditional Vietnamese architecture and modern developments, with narrow alleyways leading to hidden temples and modern shopping complexes. The ward is particularly famous for its textile trade, traditional craft workshops, and local food specialties. Its strategic location near the Cho Lon area makes it an important bridge between Vietnamese and Chinese cultural influences in the city.
interesting_facts: The name 'An Dong' means 'Peaceful East', reflecting its historical position as a peaceful settlement east of Cho Lon. The name dates back to the late 18th century when Chinese merchants first established their businesses in this area, creating a harmonious blend of Vietnamese and Chinese cultures.
An Dong Market was originally established by Chinese merchants in the late 19th century
The ward contains some of the oldest textile businesses in Ho Chi Minh City
The area is famous for its traditional moon cake makers during Mid-Autumn Festival

BAN_CO.name: Ban Co
BAN_CO.description: Ban Co ward is a dynamic urban area that seamlessly integrates residential communities with commercial spaces. Named after the historic Ban Co Market, the ward has evolved into a modern urban district while preserving its traditional charm. The area is particularly noted for its mix of architectural styles, from traditional shophouses to modern apartments, and its vibrant street life that exemplifies the city's dynamic culture.
interesting_facts: The name 'Ban Co' originates from an ancient chess board (ban co) where local scholars would gather to play Chinese chess. This tradition dates back to the late 19th century, making it one of the city's oldest recreational spaces.
The ward was home to many French colonial administrators in the early 20th century
Contains one of the city's oldest continuous markets
Features several historic temples that have been preserved since the 1850s

CAU_ONG_LANH.name: Cau Ong Lanh
CAU_ONG_LANH.description: Cau Ong Lanh ward is a historic district that showcases the rich cultural tapestry of Ho Chi Minh City. Named after the historic Ong Lanh Bridge, this ward represents the intersection of traditional commerce and modern urban development. The area is known for its historic waterways, traditional markets, and architectural heritage that spans several centuries of urban development. Its strategic location has made it a crucial commercial hub while maintaining its historical significance.
interesting_facts: The name 'Cau Ong Lanh' comes from a historic bridge built in the late 18th century. Legend has it that the bridge was named after a local elder (Ong Lanh) who helped maintain the bridge and assist travelers crossing it.
Contains some of the oldest waterway trading routes in the city
Home to several historic temples dating back to the Nguyen Dynasty
Features unique architecture that blends Vietnamese, Chinese, and French influences

NHIEU_LOC.name: Nhieu Loc
NHIEU_LOC.description: Nhieu Loc ward is a vibrant urban area that takes its name from the historic Nhieu Loc Canal, which has played a crucial role in the city's development. The ward represents a successful example of urban renewal, where the once-polluted canal has been transformed into a scenic waterway. Today, the area is characterized by its waterfront developments, recreational spaces, and a mix of traditional and modern architecture that creates a unique urban landscape.
interesting_facts: The name 'Nhieu Loc' comes from an ancient village that existed here in the 18th century. The word 'Nhieu' refers to the abundance of local products, while 'Loc' signifies prosperity, reflecting the area's historical role as a thriving trading post along the canal.
The Nhieu Loc Canal was once known as the 'Venice of Saigon' during the French colonial period
The ward has undergone one of the city's most successful environmental rehabilitation projects
Home to some of the city's most popular waterfront walking paths and recreational areas

DA_KAO.name: Da Kao
DA_KAO.description: Da Kao ward is one of the most historically significant areas of Ho Chi Minh City, known for its exceptional preservation of French colonial architecture and religious heritage. The ward features tree-lined streets, historic villas, and important religious sites that reflect the city's diverse cultural influences. Its strategic location and cultural significance have made it a prime example of how historical preservation can coexist with modern urban development.
interesting_facts: The name 'Da Kao' originates from the Khmer words 'Dak Kau', meaning 'bridge over the stream', referring to an ancient wooden bridge that once crossed a stream in this area during the pre-colonial period.
Home to the city's first modern hospital, established in the late 19th century
Contains the highest concentration of preserved French colonial villas in the city
Features several historically significant religious buildings representing different faiths

TAN_DINH.name: Tan Dinh
TAN_DINH.description: Tan Dinh ward is a historic area known for its traditional market and religious heritage. The ward successfully preserves its cultural character while adapting to modern urban needs.
interesting_facts: Home to the famous pink church and historic market
Known for its textile trade history

TAN_PHU.name: Tan Phu
TAN_PHU.description: Tan Phu ward is a developing area that combines residential communities with industrial activities. The ward features modern infrastructure while maintaining significant green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Known for its planned urban development

AN_HOI_DONG.name: An Hoi Dong
AN_HOI_DONG.description: An Hoi Dong ward is characterized by its traditional riverside community and local markets. The ward represents the authentic daily life of Ho Chi Minh City residents, with a strong focus on community activities and local trade. The area maintains its historical character while adapting to modern urban development needs.
interesting_facts: The name 'An Hoi Dong' combines 'An' (peace), 'Hoi' (meeting/gathering), and 'Dong' (east), reflecting its historical role as a peaceful gathering place in the eastern part of the area. The name dates back to the early settlement period of the region.
Home to several traditional craft workshops
Features one of the oldest community markets in the area
Known for its riverside community gardens and local produce

AN_LAC.name: An Lac
AN_LAC.description: An Lac ward is a dynamic area that combines industrial development with residential communities. The ward has evolved from its agricultural roots into a modern urban district while maintaining strong community ties. Its strategic location has made it an important hub for both commerce and residential development.
interesting_facts: The name 'An Lac' means 'peaceful happiness', reflecting the aspirations of its early settlers in the late 19th century who sought to establish a stable and prosperous community in what was then the outskirts of Saigon.
Transformed from agricultural land to urban area in the past three decades
Home to several important industrial zones
Features modern residential developments while preserving traditional community spaces

AN_PHU.name: An Phu
AN_PHU.description: An Phu ward is one of the city's most modern residential areas, known for its planned developments and international community. The ward exemplifies contemporary urban planning with its mix of high-end residential complexes, international schools, and modern amenities. While being a symbol of modern development, it also maintains green spaces and community areas.
interesting_facts: The name 'An Phu' combines 'An' (peace) and 'Phu' (prosperity), reflecting the area's development vision when it was established as a modern residential district in the early 2000s. The name was chosen to represent the aspirations for a peaceful and prosperous community.
One of the first areas in the city to implement modern urban planning standards
Home to a significant international resident population
Features some of the city's most advanced infrastructure and facilities

BINH_DONG.name: Binh Dong
BINH_DONG.description: Binh Dong ward is a historic riverside district known for its traditional waterfront activities and cultural heritage. The area has played a significant role in the city's maritime trade history and continues to be an important hub for river-based commerce and cultural activities. The ward maintains a strong connection to its waterfront identity while adapting to modern urban development.
interesting_facts: The name 'Binh Dong' originates from its location along a peaceful (binh) stretch of the eastern (dong) riverbank, dating back to the early 19th century when it was an important port area.
Home to one of the oldest riverside markets in Ho Chi Minh City
Features traditional shipbuilding and repair facilities that have operated for generations
Known for its annual river festivals and traditional boat races

BINH_TAY.name: Binh Tay
BINH_TAY.description: Binh Tay ward is centered around the famous Binh Tay Market, one of the largest wholesale markets in Ho Chi Minh City. Located in the heart of Cho Lon (Chinatown), the ward represents a vibrant mix of Vietnamese and Chinese cultures. The area is characterized by its bustling commercial activities, historic architecture, and rich cultural heritage.
interesting_facts: The name 'Binh Tay' comes from the Chinese pronunciation of 'Quach Dam', the wealthy businessman who funded the construction of the market in 1928. The market was designed with a distinctive Chinese architectural style.
The ward has been a major trading hub since the late 19th century
Features some of the oldest Chinese clan houses in the city
Home to numerous traditional medicine shops and craft workshops

CHO_LON.name: Cho Lon
CHO_LON.description: Cho Lon ward is the historic heart of Ho Chi Minh City's Chinese district, representing centuries of Chinese influence and culture. The area is famous for its traditional Chinese architecture, temples, and bustling commercial activities. As one of the city's oldest districts, it maintains its unique character while adapting to modern urban development.
interesting_facts: The name 'Cho Lon' literally means 'big market', reflecting its historical role as the largest commercial center in the region since the late 18th century when Chinese merchants first established their community here.
Contains the highest concentration of Chinese temples and clan houses in Vietnam
Many buildings feature unique fusion of Chinese, Vietnamese, and French architectural styles
Home to some of the oldest Chinese family businesses in Vietnam

BINH_TRUNG.name: Binh Trung
BINH_TRUNG.description: Binh Trung ward is a rapidly developing area that combines modern residential developments with traditional community values. The ward has transformed from a primarily agricultural area into a dynamic urban district, while maintaining significant green spaces and community facilities. Its strategic location has made it an attractive area for both residential and commercial development.
interesting_facts: The name 'Binh Trung' combines 'Binh' (peace) and 'Trung' (center), reflecting its historical role as a peaceful central meeting point between different districts. The name dates back to the early 20th century.
Was primarily rice fields and orchards until the 1990s
Home to several modern residential complexes that preserve green spaces
Features a unique blend of traditional markets and modern shopping centers

CAT_LAI.name: Cat Lai
CAT_LAI.description: Cat Lai ward is known for hosting one of Vietnam's largest ports and being a crucial logistics hub. The area has evolved from a small fishing village into a major industrial and commercial center, while maintaining some of its traditional riverside character. The ward plays a vital role in the city's economic development and international trade.
interesting_facts: The name 'Cat Lai' has historical roots dating back to the 18th century when it was a small port for sand (cat) transportation. The area has since transformed into one of Vietnam's most important container ports.
Home to Vietnam's largest container port
Was a strategic military location during various historical periods
Features a unique mix of industrial heritage and modern logistics facilities

PHU_MY.name: Phu My
PHU_MY.description: Phu My ward is a modern urban area that successfully combines residential development with commercial activities. The ward features contemporary infrastructure while maintaining significant green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Known for its innovative urban planning
Maintains extensive green spaces and parks

CON_DAO.name: Con Dao
CON_DAO.description: Con Dao Special Administrative Region is a historic archipelago with a rich but somber history, transformed into a stunning tourist destination. Known for its pristine beaches, diverse marine life, and national parks, it also serves as an important memorial site with its preserved prison complexes. The area has successfully balanced tourism development with environmental conservation.
interesting_facts: The archipelago consists of 16 islands, with Con Son being the largest
Home to some of Vietnam's most important sea turtle nesting sites
Contains historical prisons dating back to the French colonial period
Recognized as a national special historical relic since 1993

AN_KHANH.name: An Khanh
AN_KHANH.description: An Khanh ward is a rapidly developing area that combines modern residential complexes with traditional community values. The ward has transformed from a primarily agricultural area into a dynamic urban district, while maintaining significant green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Part of the ambitious Thu Thiem New Urban Area development project
Home to several modern residential complexes and international schools
Features innovative urban planning with extensive green spaces
Maintains traditional community spaces alongside modern development

AN_PHU_DONG.name: An Phu Dong
AN_PHU_DONG.description: An Phu Dong ward is characterized by its riverside location and mix of traditional and modern development. The area maintains strong connections to its agricultural heritage while embracing urban development, creating a unique blend of old and new Vietnam.
interesting_facts: Named after its location at the confluence of two rivers
Historically known for its fruit orchards and riverside gardens
Home to several traditional craft villages
Features unique riverside architecture and community spaces

BA_RIA.name: Ba Ria
BA_RIA.description: Ba Ria ward serves as an important administrative and commercial center, blending historical heritage with modern development. The area is known for its well-preserved colonial architecture, bustling markets, and efficient urban planning that maintains a balance between development and livability.
interesting_facts: Historical provincial capital with significant administrative heritage
Features a unique mix of French colonial and modern architecture
Home to several important historical sites from various periods
Known for its traditional markets and local cuisine

BAY_HIEN.name: Bay Hien
BAY_HIEN.description: Bay Hien ward is a vibrant urban area known for its diverse community and rich cultural heritage. The ward features a mix of traditional markets, modern shopping centers, and educational institutions, making it a dynamic part of the city's landscape.
interesting_facts: Named after a historic seven-way intersection that was a major transport hub
Home to several traditional craft workshops
Features one of the city's oldest community markets
Known for its diverse food culture and street food scene

BEN_CAT.name: Ben Cat
BEN_CAT.description: Ben Cat ward is characterized by its historical significance as a riverside trading post and its modern development as an industrial hub. The area maintains a balance between industrial growth and residential comfort, with well-planned green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Originally established as a river port in the late 19th century
Transformed from agricultural land to industrial zone in the 1990s
Home to several major manufacturing facilities
Features modern residential developments with preserved green spaces

BINH_CO.name: Binh Co
BINH_CO.description: Binh Co ward is a developing residential area that maintains strong connections to its agricultural heritage. The ward is known for its planned development approach, combining modern residential complexes with traditional community spaces and green areas.
interesting_facts: Named after its historically elevated terrain ('co' meaning high ground)
Formerly an important agricultural center for the region
Known for its community-driven development initiatives

BINH_DUONG.name: Binh Duong
BINH_DUONG.description: Binh Duong ward is a rapidly developing area that combines industrial growth with residential comfort. The ward has transformed from a traditional farming community into a modern urban district, while maintaining its cultural heritage and community spirit.
interesting_facts: One of the fastest-growing industrial areas in the region
Home to several international manufacturing companies
Features modern urban planning with extensive green spaces
Maintains traditional cultural festivals and community events

BINH_HOA.name: Binh Hoa
BINH_HOA.description: Binh Hoa ward is characterized by its peaceful residential areas and well-maintained public spaces. The ward successfully combines modern urban amenities with traditional community values, creating a comfortable living environment for its residents.
interesting_facts: Known for its well-planned residential areas and parks
Features a mix of traditional and modern architecture

BINH_HUNG_HOA.name: Binh Hung Hoa
BINH_HUNG_HOA.description: Binh Hung Hoa ward is a dynamic area undergoing rapid transformation, balancing industrial development with residential needs. The ward maintains its traditional community spirit while embracing modern urban development and infrastructure improvements.
interesting_facts: One of the largest wards by area in the district
Successfully transformed from agricultural land to urban development
Home to several important industrial zones

BINH_LOI_TRUNG.name: Binh Loi Trung
BINH_LOI_TRUNG.description: Binh Loi Trung ward is a riverside community known for its historical bridge and developing urban landscape. The ward combines traditional riverside living with modern urban development, creating a unique blend of old and new Vietnam.
interesting_facts: Named after the historic Binh Loi Bridge, an important transportation link
Features a mix of traditional riverside communities and modern developments
Home to several historical sites from the early 20th century
Known for its riverside parks and recreational areas

BINH_PHU.name: Binh Phu
BINH_PHU.description: Binh Phu ward is a developing residential area that maintains a strong connection to its agricultural roots. The ward is characterized by its planned development approach, combining modern residential areas with preserved green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Originally an agricultural area known for its fruit orchards
Successfully transformed into a modern residential district
Features several educational institutions and sports facilities
Known for its community-driven development initiatives

BINH_QUOI.name: Binh Quoi
BINH_QUOI.description: Binh Quoi ward is renowned for its scenic riverside location and tourist attractions. The area successfully preserves traditional Vietnamese culture while developing modern recreational facilities, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists.
interesting_facts: Home to famous tourist villages showcasing traditional Vietnamese life
Features extensive riverside gardens and recreational areas
Known for its traditional Vietnamese cuisine and cultural shows
Maintains several preserved historical buildings and structures

BINH_TAN.name: Binh Tan
BINH_TAN.description: Binh Tan ward is a rapidly developing area that combines industrial zones with residential communities. The ward has transformed from agricultural land into a modern urban district, featuring well-planned infrastructure and community facilities.
interesting_facts: One of the fastest-growing industrial areas in Ho Chi Minh City
Features modern urban planning with extensive green spaces
Home to several major manufacturing companies
Known for its innovative approach to urban development

BINH_THANH.name: Binh Thanh
BINH_THANH.description: Binh Thanh ward is a vibrant urban area known for its mix of traditional and modern lifestyles. The ward features a diverse range of residential options, from historic buildings to modern apartments, alongside numerous cultural and recreational facilities.
interesting_facts: Home to a unique blend of architectural styles spanning different eras
Features several historic temples and pagodas
Known for its diverse food scene and local markets

BINH_THOI.name: Binh Thoi
BINH_THOI.description: Binh Thoi ward is characterized by its traditional market culture and developing urban landscape. The ward maintains its historical charm while embracing modern development, creating a unique atmosphere that attracts both residents and visitors.
interesting_facts: Home to one of the oldest traditional markets in the district
Features a unique mix of old shophouses and modern buildings
Known for its diverse street food culture

BINH_TIEN.name: Binh Tien
BINH_TIEN.description: Binh Tien ward is a dynamic area that combines traditional commerce with modern development. Known for its wholesale markets and industrial facilities, the ward maintains a balance between commercial activities and residential comfort.
interesting_facts: Home to one of the largest wholesale textile markets in the city
Features a unique blend of traditional and modern architecture
Known for its historical trading connections

BINH_TRI_DONG.name: Binh Tri Dong
BINH_TRI_DONG.description: Binh Tri Dong ward is a developing area that successfully combines industrial growth with residential comfort. The ward features well-planned infrastructure and maintains significant green spaces while supporting industrial development.
interesting_facts: One of the key industrial development zones in the district
Home to several major manufacturing facilities
Maintains extensive green spaces and community facilities

CAU_KIEU.name: Cau Kieu
CAU_KIEU.description: Cau Kieu ward is a historic area known for its traditional architecture and cultural heritage. The ward maintains its historical character while adapting to modern urban needs, creating a unique blend of old and new Vietnam.
interesting_facts: Named after a historic bridge that was an important trading route
Contains several well-preserved French colonial buildings
Known for its traditional craft workshops
Features unique architectural elements from different periods

CHANH_HIEP.name: Chanh Hiep
CHANH_HIEP.description: Chanh Hiep ward is a developing residential area that maintains strong connections to its agricultural heritage. The ward successfully combines modern urban development with preserved green spaces and traditional community values.
interesting_facts: Originally an important agricultural center for the region
Features several preserved historical sites and buildings
Known for its community-driven development initiatives

CHANH_HUNG.name: Chanh Hung
CHANH_HUNG.description: Chanh Hung ward is a vibrant area that combines traditional riverside living with modern urban development. The ward is known for its waterfront activities and strong community spirit, while embracing contemporary urban planning.
interesting_facts: Features a historic riverside market and trading area
Known for its traditional boat-building industry
Home to several important religious sites
Maintains strong connections to river-based commerce

CHANH_PHU_HOA.name: Chanh Phu Hoa
CHANH_PHU_HOA.description: Chanh Phu Hoa ward is a developing residential area that maintains a perfect balance between urban growth and environmental preservation. The ward is known for its planned development approach and strong community facilities.
interesting_facts: Features innovative urban planning with extensive green spaces
Home to several modern educational facilities
Known for its community sports complexes

DI_AN.name: Di An
DI_AN.description: Di An ward is a rapidly developing area that combines industrial growth with residential comfort. The ward features modern infrastructure and maintains significant green spaces while supporting industrial development.
interesting_facts: One of the major industrial centers in the region
Home to several major educational institutions
Known for its planned urban development

DIEN_HONG.name: Dien Hong
DIEN_HONG.description: Dien Hong ward is characterized by its historical significance and modern urban development. The ward maintains its cultural heritage while embracing contemporary urban planning and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Named after a significant historical event in Vietnamese history
Known for its cultural activities and festivals

DONG_HOA.name: Dong Hoa
DONG_HOA.description: Dong Hoa ward is a developing area that successfully balances industrial growth with environmental preservation. The ward features modern infrastructure while maintaining significant green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Home to several high-tech industrial facilities
Known for its planned green spaces and parks

DONG_HUNG_THUAN.name: Dong Hung Thuan
DONG_HUNG_THUAN.description: Dong Hung Thuan ward is a developing residential area that maintains a strong connection to its agricultural heritage. The ward successfully combines modern urban amenities with preserved green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Originally an important agricultural center for the region
Known for its community gardens and parks

DUC_NHUAN.name: Duc Nhuan
DUC_NHUAN.description: Duc Nhuan ward is characterized by its historical architecture and cultural heritage. The ward maintains its traditional character while adapting to modern urban needs, creating a unique blend of old and new Vietnam.
interesting_facts: Contains several well-preserved French colonial buildings
Known for its traditional craft workshops
Features unique architectural elements from different periods
Home to several important religious sites

GIA_DINH.name: Gia Dinh
GIA_DINH.description: Gia Dinh ward is a historic area that played a significant role in the city's development. The ward combines its rich heritage with modern urban amenities, creating a vibrant community space that honors its past while embracing the future.
interesting_facts: Named after the historic Gia Dinh province
Known for its traditional markets and food culture

GO_VAP.name: Go Vap
GO_VAP.description: Go Vap ward is a dynamic urban area that successfully combines residential development with commercial activities. The ward features modern infrastructure while maintaining its cultural heritage and community spirit.
interesting_facts: One of the most populous wards in the district
Known for its diverse food culture and markets

HANH_THONG.name: Hanh Thong
HANH_THONG.description: Hanh Thong ward is characterized by its traditional community spirit and modern urban development. The ward maintains its historical charm while embracing contemporary amenities and infrastructure improvements.
interesting_facts: Known for its traditional craft workshops
Maintains strong cultural traditions and festivals

HIEP_BINH.name: Hiep Binh
HIEP_BINH.description: Hiep Binh ward is a developing area that successfully balances residential comfort with environmental preservation. The ward features modern urban planning while maintaining significant green spaces and riverside amenities.
interesting_facts: Known for its environmental conservation efforts
Home to several modern residential complexes
Maintains significant green spaces and parks

HOA_BINH.name: Hoa Binh
HOA_BINH.description: Hoa Binh ward is a peaceful residential area that successfully combines modern urban amenities with traditional community values. The ward features well-planned infrastructure while maintaining significant green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Known for its peaceful residential environment
Maintains extensive green spaces and parks

HOA_HUNG.name: Hoa Hung
HOA_HUNG.description: Hoa Hung ward is characterized by its mix of traditional architecture and modern development. The ward maintains its historical charm while embracing contemporary urban planning and infrastructure improvements.
interesting_facts: Known for its traditional markets and food culture

KHANH_HOI.name: Khanh Hoi
KHANH_HOI.description: Khanh Hoi ward is a vibrant riverside area that combines commercial activities with residential development. The ward features important port facilities while maintaining its historical character and community spirit.
interesting_facts: Historical port area with significant maritime heritage
Known for its traditional markets and food culture

LAI_THIEU.name: Lai Thieu
LAI_THIEU.description: Lai Thieu ward is renowned for its fruit orchards and traditional pottery craft. The ward successfully preserves its agricultural heritage while developing modern urban amenities and infrastructure.
interesting_facts: Famous for its traditional fruit orchards and pottery making
Known for its unique local festivals
Home to significant agricultural heritage sites

LINH_XUAN.name: Linh Xuan
LINH_XUAN.description: Linh Xuan ward is a developing area that combines educational facilities with residential communities. The ward features modern infrastructure while maintaining significant green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Home to several major educational institutions
Known for its innovative urban planning
Maintains extensive green spaces and parks

LONG_BINH.name: Long Binh
LONG_BINH.description: Long Binh ward is a strategic area that combines industrial development with residential communities. The ward features important transportation infrastructure while maintaining green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Features significant industrial and logistics facilities
Known for its planned urban development

LONG_HUONG.name: Long Huong
LONG_HUONG.description: Long Huong ward is a developing area that combines residential communities with industrial zones. The ward features modern infrastructure while maintaining traditional community values and green spaces.
interesting_facts: Features a mix of industrial and residential development
Known for its community-driven development initiatives
Home to several modern manufacturing facilities
Maintains significant green spaces and parks

LONG_PHUOC.name: Long Phuoc
LONG_PHUOC.description: Long Phuoc ward is characterized by its agricultural heritage and developing urban landscape. The ward maintains its traditional farming communities while embracing modern infrastructure and facilities.
interesting_facts: Known for its agricultural production and fruit orchards
Maintains extensive agricultural lands and green spaces

LONG_TRUONG.name: Long Truong
LONG_TRUONG.description: Long Truong ward is a rapidly developing area that combines modern residential complexes with preserved green spaces. The ward features contemporary urban planning while maintaining environmental sustainability.
interesting_facts: Home to several modern residential developments
Known for its environmental conservation efforts
Maintains extensive green corridors and parks

MINH_PHUNG.name: Minh Phung
MINH_PHUNG.description: Minh Phung ward is characterized by its traditional market culture and developing urban landscape. The ward maintains its historical charm while embracing modern infrastructure and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Home to one of the oldest traditional markets in the district
Known for its diverse food culture

PHU_AN.name: Phu An
PHU_AN.description: Phu An ward is a riverside community that combines traditional waterfront activities with modern urban development. The ward features important port facilities while maintaining its cultural heritage and community spirit.
interesting_facts: Known for its traditional fishing community
Home to several important religious sites
Maintains strong connections to maritime activities

PHU_DINH.name: Phu Dinh
PHU_DINH.description: Phu Dinh ward is a developing area that combines industrial activities with residential communities. The ward features modern infrastructure while maintaining traditional community values and green spaces.
interesting_facts: Known for its planned urban development
Maintains significant green spaces and parks

PHU_LAM.name: Phu Lam
PHU_LAM.description: Phu Lam ward is a vibrant area that combines traditional market culture with modern urban development. The ward maintains its historical character while embracing contemporary infrastructure and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Home to one of the largest traditional markets in the district
Known for its diverse food culture

PHU_NHUAN.name: Phu Nhuan
PHU_NHUAN.description: Phu Nhuan ward is a dynamic urban area known for its mix of traditional and modern lifestyles. The ward features diverse residential options and commercial activities while maintaining its cultural heritage.
interesting_facts: Known for its jewelry crafting tradition
Features a unique blend of architectural styles
Home to several important religious sites

PHU_THANH.name: Phu Thanh
PHU_THANH.description: Phu Thanh ward is a developing residential area that successfully combines modern urban amenities with traditional community values. The ward features well-planned infrastructure while maintaining significant green spaces and community facilities.
interesting_facts: Known for its community-driven development initiatives
Maintains extensive green spaces and parks

PHU_THO.name: Phu Tho
PHU_THO.description: Phu Tho ward is characterized by its sports facilities and educational institutions. The ward combines recreational spaces with residential areas while maintaining its community spirit and green spaces.
